game.name: Space Chasers
game.description:
It is always exiting and exhilarating to spend time in space. Today we have brought to you a brand new arcade game where you have to play the role of a commander of the space task force. Hey! It is not a 9 to 5 job, but you have to be attentive to all the time to reply a horde of pirates who have invaded your area forcefully.  The only way to clear the area from these deadly souls is to chase after them by matching 3 or more same symbols. 

There are many funny and challenging levels to explore in Space Chasers. Try to put your fingers on the mouse on the screen of your mobile to let your task force engage and destroy the spaceships of pirates by making as many successful matches as you can! Impressive attacks can help you create good score and enjoy some more time as well. Remember making longer attack chains can also help you get some extra time. Be careful and complete your mission without running out of time in this html5 matching game! 

Make sure to release the devastating firepower by creating the longer chains. Your pirates are very sharp and try to run away from that area. So stop them from escaping by putting your brain powder and cool matching abilities in this match-3 puzzle challenge. It features awesome sci-fi style graphics, a role playing aspect and innovative hexagonial match 3 mechanics. Join this unique arcade connect challenge to live the life of a space commander for one day!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS AND SWIPE TO ONNECT THE SAME IMAGES TO ATTACK
